722758f-a.text:
Riverside Drive at 108th St., looking south.
B. Hufnagel, photographer.
William J. McAlpine, supervising engineer. The subgrade having been excavated a little too low, the foundation stones which have been placed in May 1879, had to be at least twelve to fourteen inches depth as are shown in this picture.
May 13, 1879
Deposited with NYPL by NYC Park Dept. 1931

722759f-a.text:
Riverside Drive at 108th St., looking north.
B. Hufnagel, photographer.
William J. McAlpine supervising engineer.
April 4, 1879
cloudy & windy
Deposited with NYPL by NYC Park Dept. 1931

722760f.text:
Riverside Drive, at and adjoining the S.E. corner of 108th Street. The view also shows 108th Street, at and adjoining the
S.E. corner of Riverside Drive.
1923.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.

722761f-a.text:
355 Riverside Drive, at the S.E. corner of 108th Street, showing the Residence of S. G. Bayne, which will soon be demolished to
make way for a 14Story apartment house.
About 1921.
Gift of E. M. Jenks.

Neg # 1311
